articles.title: NNPC signs gas pipeline agreement with Morocco - Premium Times

articles.content: The Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) Limited on Thursday signed agreements on the gas pipeline project with the National Office of Hydrocarbons and Mines of Morocco and the ECOWAS Commissio… [+3969 chars]
